title: Unified Soldiers

tokens.lyric: Strong bond of heart is the force bringing the
world into
life,

lines.raw: [Am]Strong bond of heart is the force bringing the [F]world into [Em]life,

tokens.lyric: Joined in a kinship of love, all shall live as
one.

lines.raw: [Am]Joined in a kinship of love, all shall live as [Dm]one.

tokens.lyric: Here in the home of our hearts, we'll share
evermore.

lines.raw: [Am]Here in the home of our hearts, we'll share [G]evermore.

tokens.lyric: On this foundation of happiness, we shall live
forever.

lines.raw: [F]On this foundation of happiness, we shall live [Dm]forever.

tokens.lyric: We're His pride in the heavenly war,

lines.raw: [C]We're His pride in the heavenly war,

tokens.lyric: Unified soldiers!
Mightily, with one
accord,

lines.raw: [F]Unified soldiers! [C]Mightily, with one [G]accord,

tokens.lyric: We shall march, we shall march
on!

lines.raw: [C]We shall march, we shall march [F]on!

tokens.lyric: True men of boundless domain, magnifying their light,

lines.raw: [Am]True men of boundless domain, magnifying their light,

tokens.lyric: Glorious beacons of truth, o'er all things of the earth.

lines.raw: [Am]Glorious beacons of truth, o'er all things of the earth.

tokens.lyric: From that original word life will spring and grow;

lines.raw: [Am]From that original word life will spring and grow;

tokens.lyric: In its expression it gives to all the fulfillment of hope.

lines.raw: [Am]In its expression it gives to all the fulfillment of hope.

tokens.lyric: We're His pride in the heavenly war,

lines.raw: [Am]We're His pride in the heavenly war,

tokens.lyric: Unified soldiers!
Mightily, His will to
do,

lines.raw: [C]Unified soldiers! [F]Mightily, His will to [C]do,

tokens.lyric: We shall march, we shall march on!

lines.raw: [G]We shall march, we shall march on!

tokens.lyric: Based on the order of God, We'll build truthfulness,

lines.raw: [Am]Based on the order of God, We'll build truthfulness,

tokens.lyric: One constant value that gives pledge of eternity.

lines.raw: [Am]One constant value that gives pledge of eternity.

tokens.lyric: The highest standard of truth which is raised above,

lines.raw: [Am]The highest standard of truth which is raised above,

tokens.lyric: Will decorate far distant days of radiant goodness.

lines.raw: [Am]Will decorate far distant days of radiant goodness.

tokens.lyric: We're His price in the heavenly war,

lines.raw: [Am]We're His price in the heavenly war,

tokens.lyric: Unified soldiers!
Mightily,
proclaiming,

lines.raw: [C]Unified soldiers! [F]Mightily, [C]proclaiming,

tokens.lyric: We shall march, we shall march on!

lines.raw: [G]We shall march, we shall march on!

tokens.lyric: New culture dawns in the East, Glorious beyond our dreams.

lines.raw: [Am]New culture dawns in the East, Glorious beyond our dreams.

tokens.lyric: Mankind transformed in its light, shall be one family.

lines.raw: [Am]Mankind transformed in its light, shall be one family.

tokens.lyric: Ever to serve and attend our True Parents' own,

lines.raw: [Am]Ever to serve and attend our True Parents' own,

tokens.lyric: Without a doubt the world shall be one world of victory.

lines.raw: [Am]Without a doubt the world shall be one world of victory.

tokens.lyric: We're His pride in the heavenly war,

lines.raw: [Am]We're His pride in the heavenly war,

tokens.lyric: Unified soldiers!
Mightily, into that
ideal,

lines.raw: [C]Unified soldiers! [F]Mightily, into that [C]ideal,

tokens.lyric: We shall march, we shall march on!

lines.raw: [G]We shall march, we shall march on!
